all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, do the things which I have commanded you, saith your Redeemer, even the Son Ahman, who prepareth all things before he taketh you;
Doctrine and Covenants 78:20
Quote of the Day
"The Master Healer will heal all our afflictions—physical and emotional—in His time."
President Camille N. Johnson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
